body.name: Straw Cover Cap for Stanley Cup - 4Pcs Cute Silicone 10mm Straw Toppers Compatible with Stanley 30&40 oz Tumblers
features: Perfect Fit for 10mm/0.4-inch Straws: These straw covers are precisely designed for 10mm/0.4-inch straws, ensuring a snug and secure fit. They are an ideal match for Stanley 30&40 Oz tumbler 10mm/0.4-inch straws.

Fun and Decorative: Elevate your drink with our 10mm/0.4-inch straw caps. Available in various vibrant colors and creative designs, they effortlessly add a touch of personality and charm to your favorite beverages.

Eco-Friendly and Reusable: Crafted from top-quality silicone, our caps are both durable and environmentally friendly. By choosing these caps, you're reducing single-use plastic waste while enjoying an elegant and functional drinking experience.

Hygiene and Aesthetics: Our straw covers are your trusted shield against dust and spills. They maintain the freshness of your drinks and prevent any accidental spills, making them an indispensable companion for outdoor activities, travel, and everyday use.

Versatile Compatibility: These straw covers aren't limited to a single tumbler type. They exhibit versatility and work with various 10mm/0.4-inch straws, making them a versatile choice for different drinkware.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 10mm (0.4-inch) Straw Covers Perfectly for Stanley Adventure Quencher 40oz & 30oz 20oz Tumbler 0.4-inch Straw Note: Please Confirm the Diameter of the Straw Before PurchasingDesigned to perfectly fit 10mm(0.4-inch) straws. They provide a safe and hygienic solution for your drinkware.With creative and cute shapes, these straw caps are not only functional but also add a decorative element to your beverages.Suitable for various settings, including home, office, and outdoor activities. They keep dust and contaminants from spoiling your drinks, ensuring a clean and enjoyable sip every time.
Great Gift Idea These unique straw caps make an excellent gift for friends, family, or anyone who enjoys their beverages on the go.

Enhanced Hygiene and Aesthetics Our straw covers serve as a reliable barrier against dust and spills. They keep your drinks fresh and prevent accidental spills, making them an essential companion for outdoor activities, travel, and everyday use.
Mood-Enhancing Colors Choose from pink, blue, white, and purple to match your mood or outfit – a stylish and functional addition to your drinkware.
Party Essentials Make your parties more exciting by offering guests various cap shapes to choose from, adding a fun twist to any gathering.

Please Ensure the Diameter of the Straw Before Purchasing. Our straw caps are only suitable for 0.4-inch/10mm diameter straws and are not compatible with 0.24-inch/6mm, 0.31-inch/8mm, 0.47-inch/12mm, or other straw sizes. Are They Fit Stanley Cup？ Our straw caps are specifically designed to fit 0.4-inch/10mm straws, and they work perfectly with Stanley cups that have 0.4-inch/10mm straws. However, they are not compatible with 0.24-inch/6mm or 0.31-inch/8mm straws. What You Get？ 5PCs 10mm Straw Covers (straws are not included)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tiny Toppers, Big Convenience!
reviews.reviewText: Let's be honest, reusable straws are awesome for the planet, but sometimes I get a little tired of fishing leaves and dust bunnies out of my Stanley tumbler before each sip. Enter these adorable little silicone straw caps! They fit perfectly on my trusty 30oz cup (and I'm guessing they'd work on the 40oz too, based on the description), creating a snug seal that keeps out the gunk without looking bulky or weird.Speaking of cute, these little toppers come in a fun pack of five with different designs, so I can switch things up depending on my mood. They're super easy to pop on and off, even with one hand, which is a lifesaver when I'm wrangling groceries or a particularly wiggly toddler. Plus, they're dishwasher-safe, so cleanup is a breeze.Bottom line? These straw caps are a tiny addition that makes a big difference in my reusable straw experience. They're practical, adorable, and totally worth the price. If you're a Stanley tumbler fan (or just someone who hates straw surprises), definitely give them a try!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Make me Smile
reviews.reviewText: These straw caps are so cute! I bought them for my granddaughter but kept a few for myself! When I opened the package it made me smile! So colorful and really adds to the straw along with covering the cap! They fit perfectly on the 40 oz Stanley cup straws!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and fun but very loose
reviews.reviewText: These are so cute and fun for my daughter’s Stanley. They do fit very loosely on the straw so they easily fall off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These straw toppers are so cute!! They are well made and can be used on a variety of different straws. My daughter uses hers on her Stanley, and I use mine with my Yeti and a metal straw. You can’t beat the price. I chose the smaller pack of 4 and paid just under $4. I’ve seen them much higher elsewhere. The only complaint I have, is that they don’t fit snuggly on the straw (even on the Stanley straw), so it doesn’t make it spill proof. I know that because my daughter had her topper closed and dropped her Stanley in my car and water spilled everywhere. If you’re looking for a waterproof version, this isn’t it. But if you’re just looking to add something cute to your drink and to keep things from getting in your straw ( dust, flies etc), it’s worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly on my Stanley and is so cute

reviews.reviewText: They are cute and do what they are supposed to but daughter was disappointed she didn't receive the star as advertised just 2 clouds.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits Stanley cups straw’s perfectly
reviews.reviewText: These caps are too cute! I bought for my 10 year old niece as a Christmas present to go with her Stanley cup and she absolutely loved them.
